Get the facts on the Global Compact #ForMigration here: https://t.co/Tm4FgQw0Xa

More related news: https://t.co/U7mUuDbeKY https://t.co/3taXmBichX

"For 70 years, the Universal Declaration of Human Rights has been a global beacon – shining a light for dignity, equality & well-being" -- @antonioguterres on Monday’s #HumanRightsDay https://t.co/ZCJXUVqY8O #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/BaRZqWkkzP
Young people recount harrowing journeys as countries gather to adopt Global Compact #ForMigration: https://t.co/OkclR4cUwM https://t.co/LO7EYiaWzY
“Corruption is an assault on the values of the United Nations.”-- @antonioguterres on Sunday's Int’l Anti-Corruption Day. https://t.co/rLx8X4Xwr8 #UnitedAgainstCorruption https://t.co/SthdFUzBgC
World leaders gather in Marrakech, Morocco to adopt landmark Global Compact #ForMigration -- for a safer & more dignifed life for people on the move. https://t.co/PsIg7OTNtT https://t.co/puIE2oWJVo
"Seventy years later, the prevention of genocide remains a cardinal task for our time." -- @antonioguterres on Sunday's #PreventGenocide Day ⬇️ https://t.co/W9Jbjrk1p2 https://t.co/tEpxu5C28X

"You can earn money and create jobs, a cleaner environment & a better world at the same time" – @UNEnvironment Goodwill Ambassador @bertrandpiccard from @solarimpulse explains how at #COP24: https://t.co/K59tWKrLcj https://t.co/mWYbk3zBbS

70 years since its adoption, watch as @UNYouthEnvoy & @YouTube #CreatorsforChange celebrate the Universal Declaration of Human Rights. https://t.co/2YXykxY7Go #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/yXIIHN13MB
70 years after the adoption of the Genocide Convention, learn more about what the UN is doing to #PreventGenocide ➡️ https://t.co/EesVqkthTH https://t.co/qVhobEcxj3

Bribery, embezzlement, money laundering ... corruption has many forms. 

On Sunday's Intl Anti-Corruption Day, let's stand #UnitedAgainstCorruption:  https://t.co/iw4v9iG35i https://t.co/BdWzfUWRmc
On the 70th anniversary of the #PreventGenocide Convention, @UN_GP_RtoP is calling for universal ratification of the landmark document: https://t.co/W9Jbjr2q0s https://t.co/qSwdUIZE74

Ahead of Global Compact #ForMigration meeting in Morocco, UN Climate Conference #COP24 in Poland discusses recommendations for countries to cope with displacement of people as result of climate change. https://t.co/CYOKW6iImN via @UNFCCC https://t.co/oTRtCZ04Jl

"Men and women have the right to choose when and how often to embrace parenthood – if at all…”. Learn more about @UNFPA 's work to protect this essential human right: https://t.co/jlUuw4Z2oi #Standup4HumanRights https://t.co/0wglwLhaIr

In 2019, nearly 132M people in 42 countries will need humanitarian assistance. @UNOCHA's Global Humanitarian Overview breaks down the staggering numbers ➡️ https://t.co/Uxga5v2dEf #InvestInHumanity https://t.co/mZTJ2PD1aT

☑️ Buy local products
☑️ Bring your own shopping bag
☑️ Recycle

When it comes to #ClimateAction, small steps go a long way. Visit https://t.co/zTkumwgS40 to see what YOU can do to tackle climate change. https://t.co/Ej8giylRgn
Young people from around the world are in Marrakech, Morocco to address the challenges & find solutions #ForMigration. Watch live here: https://t.co/AzmceHgTSd https://t.co/70M5JaQUib

"We are not just looking for speeches to be delivered in the #UNGA hall, we are looking for climate champions." Special Envoy for the 2019 Climate Summit @ladealba at #COP24. Watch the full interview: https://t.co/q4CRl8Mngq https://t.co/8juN96czJe

Changing small, everyday habits can go a long way towards protecting the ecosystem. Next time you shop, remember your choices make a difference to the planet ➡️ https://t.co/lo0glrHT2X #GlobalGoals https://t.co/nF0gGhUQqs
"Because of climate change, extreme weather events are more intense," Deputy Head of @WMO Elena Manaenkova explains at #COP24. https://t.co/totxzdZPc4 https://t.co/6kVqReSNT4

Activists & experts from around the world are gathering in Marrakech, Morocco on the margins of the high-level conference to adopt a Global Compact #ForMigration: https://t.co/JMzuYCHffH https://t.co/M2zp0M05KK

Young people are asking policy makers to implement the #ParisAgreement so we can all live on a healthy planet with a secure & prosperous future -- @UNYouthEnvoy at #COP24 https://t.co/totxzdZPc4 https://t.co/ch0epDbbwc
"We must act now before we lose control of the future of Yemen", urged @OSE_Yemen Martin Griffiths at Thursday's UN-backed talks between the Government and Houthi opposition: https://t.co/usARHleGBA

“There is no more important cause than to defend the fundamental human rights of our fellow men & women.” -- Angelina Jolie on 70th anniversary of Universal Declaration of Human Rights. #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/F3bWe9gIER

The Global Compact #ForMigration forces nothing on anybody. --@louise_arbour emphasizes the Compact's respect for the sovereignty of all countries ahead of its expected adoption in Morocco next week. https://t.co/HWsXlR5Kl3 https://t.co/aPg8z7dHej

Gender equality in aviation requires action.

On Friday’s #FlyDay, @icao urges the industry to remove barriers that hinder women’s participation. https://t.co/tIqC4Lqh93 #GlobalGoals https://t.co/Fy2qULxQOL
9,000 commitments from 128 countries & more than 6,000 businesses showcase global #ClimateAction in the @UNFCCC Yearbook ➡️ https://t.co/hcu2TRl8bh https://t.co/bjj8ICPdyE

Drones and jumbo jets are helping meet today's food challenges.

On Friday's #FlyDay, @icao highlights the aviation industry's contributions to food security: https://t.co/tIqC4Lqh93 https://t.co/dkuuJZHslH

"This new compact ...will provide a clear framework & solid platform for cooperation." -- @antonioguterres at launch of new Global Counter-Terrorism Compact https://t.co/8PFVgYOBXP via @UN_OCT https://t.co/bcIIXHn9Zh

"We will have the opportunity to launch an unprecedented process of cooperation to harness the benefits of human mobility," @louise_arbour ahead of meeting to adopt Global Compact #ForMigration https://t.co/1npLFvyad7 https://t.co/sqfpbadccX

We have hope in the 1.8 billion young people. We have hope because they are saying climate change is a race we can win. -- @UNYouthEnvoy at #COP24. https://t.co/totxzdZPc4 #ClimateAction https://t.co/vDPCTXEl1l

Thursday is Youth Day at the UN Climate Conference #COP24 in Poland. Find out how everyone - regardless of age - can take #ClimateAction: https://t.co/PsMedQgQzD
👶👧🏽👦🏾👨🏼👩🏼‍🦰👨🏿‍🦳🧓🏽👵🏻 https://t.co/KrdcPRYonB

.@UN_GP_RtoP's Adama Dieng speaking about horrors of genocide. ⬇️ Use #PreventGenocide to submit your question for Holocaust survivors & it may be answered at special event with @USCShoahFdn on 7 Dec: https://t.co/9O40P5OCgS https://t.co/kwV9r8YDJs

All of our livelihoods depend on the land-based ecosystem. The #GlobalGoals aim to protect our planet by restoring forests, biodiversity & halting desertification ➡️ https://t.co/tpLHOOLOkw https://t.co/ao6HaKYvdV

1 in every 30 people in the world is a migrant - and they all deserve a life of dignity & safety. 

Next week in Morocco, governments will come together to adopt the Global Compact #ForMigration: https://t.co/mux44BlBre https://t.co/teoAAqx92G
#ClimateAction could save a million lives from air pollution alone by 2050, @WHO says in special report launched Wednesday at #COP24: https://t.co/hyydTj23NF #GlobalGoals
Get up to speed on the major issues facing world leaders at next week's meeting in Marrakech on Global Compact #ForMigration https://t.co/wGXcqTiRot
As leaders meet at the #COP24 climate conference, see how women and girls are impacted by climate change and are taking #ClimateAction: https://t.co/UUbf1uvr5f via @UN_Women https://t.co/8a84H105h0

"We have to think about our children & grandchildren. Let's take #ClimateAction now," appeals Austrian President @vanderbellen, who arrived at #COP24 in Poland by train to reduce his carbon footprint. https://t.co/tmdfYDwo5I https://t.co/cdb2cBRtky

Nutritious & good quality food can only be produced if our soils are healthy.

Reduce, reuse & recycle on Wednesday's #WorldSoilDay: https://t.co/ad7M5exJPh
"Plethora of unimaginable abuses" by ISIL exposed since the extremist group's ouster from Iraqi & Syrian strongholds, says head of UN investigation: https://t.co/h6YRwd7v6O

“The goal of reform is a 21st-century United Nations focused more on people and less on process; more on delivery and less on bureaucracy.” -- @antonioguterres on UN Reform https://t.co/NA8GiXg5eV https://t.co/kZGU7XS2yv

Soil pollution affects the food we eat, the water we drink & the air we breathe.

On Wednesday's #WorldSoilDay, be the solution to #StopSoilPollution. https://t.co/vgC7Iq9b1H https://t.co/GQmkITybFG
"The time is now to realize Mandela’s vision - and the #GlobalGoals provide the plan" -- SDG Advocates @erna_solberg & @NAkufoAddo on sustainable development and #Mandela100 https://t.co/EzSUNIrUci

How do you volunteer to build #ResilientCommunities?

Record a 15-minute video & tag @UNVolunteers to share your experience. https://t.co/sJxhQFNWTU #GlobalGoals https://t.co/l2arBxx3Vc

Healthy soils produce healthy crops that in turn nourish people & animals. 

On Wednesday's #WorldSoilDay and every day, #StopSoilPollution: https://t.co/vgC7IpRzD7 https://t.co/YSHs02csMw

We all need to work together to make the #ParisAgreement a reality, says Arnold @Schwarzenegger at #COP24 in Poland. Here's how you can join him in taking #ClimateAction: https://t.co/tmdfYDeMH8 https://t.co/0ozdGmblxP

Use #PreventGenocide to submit your questions for Holocaust survivors about ways to be #StrongerThanHate. Select questions will be answered on 7 Dec at a special event with @USCShoahFdn: https://t.co/9O40P5OCgS https://t.co/44JCqpvl6q

In the face of natural disasters, economic stresses & political shocks, volunteers help build #ResilientCommunities.

Wednesday is Int'l Volunteer Day: https://t.co/WWUwwMqBPu #GlobalGoals https://t.co/TMPLVrbmrp
700 health care workers were attacked or killed while trying to do their job in 2017. They are #NotATarget ➡️: https://t.co/ctwZexE31k #InvestinHumanity https://t.co/87F789uLay

There are 258 million migrants worldwide. They spend 85% of their earnings in their host communities. 

Countries will meet next week in Morocco to adopt the Global Compact #ForMigration: https://t.co/CMBLgP7Krt https://t.co/L7y6GvMn6w

Now's your chance to make small changes in your daily routine that will make a big difference for our planet. Go to https://t.co/zTkumwgS40 and see what #ClimateAction is all about. https://t.co/tDMEgHNGHC

Apply now: @UN_HRC is seeking qualified candidates, preferably of indigenous origin, to provide advice & expertise on the rights of indigenous peoples: https://t.co/kY1qnsWfaS #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/K2p3lPHCjD

The #ParisAgreement is "a historic compact among nations, a compact to ensure our survival."

At #COP24 @antonioguterres stresses the urgency of #ClimateAction. https://t.co/totxzdZPc4 https://t.co/2BDR7bYbFM
Reaching gender parity is a key goal of UN reform. See what's being done to create a more efficient & effective UN: https://t.co/wN0fZ7mfnq https://t.co/2I7yTZjJqK

Tuesday: launch of Global Humanitarian Overview, the world’s most comprehensive assessment of global humanitarian needs, response & requirements https://t.co/6vdfvlbqQG #InvestInHumanity https://t.co/MhrgLyvZRG
You don’t have to wait for others to save the planet. Join the global movement to take everyday #ClimateAction ➡️ https://t.co/zTkumwgS40 https://t.co/kzIQnm76tY
"#ClimateAction is not just the right thing to do – it makes social and economic sense." -- @antonioguterres at opening of UN Climate Conference #COP24 https://t.co/ExKXGAMcXs https://t.co/V33W3DpU7i
Empowering people with disabilities & ensuring inclusiveness can help achieve #GlobalGoals. New report: https://t.co/7YLeBBDfQL https://t.co/mw5gr6iab9
Starts on Tuesday @UNGeneva: Biological Weapons Convention - Meeting of States Parties. Documents & Info ➡️ https://t.co/tx3vA500hp & follow @BWCISU https://t.co/VQWSRfLZgv

Starting soon: Sir David Attenborough delivers speech shaped by your comments demanding more #ClimateAction at UN Climate Conference #COP24. #TakeYourSeat & watch live on @facebook: https://t.co/IKJq0LfmOL https://t.co/Xe0WNW7w8w

"#ClimateAction offers a compelling path to transform our world for the better." -- @antonioguterres at opening of UN Climate Conference #COP24 in Poland. https://t.co/ExKXGAMcXs https://t.co/AxtloeryJc
Starting now: Opening ceremony of UN Climate Conference #COP24 in Katowice, Poland with @antonioguterres, & more. Watch live: https://t.co/R5AGYmV7Yy https://t.co/9OUGbS41Y5
Continues this week @UNGeneva: Committee on the Elimination of Racial Discrimination (through 14 Dec). Documents & Info here  ➡️ https://t.co/118pODPfxy #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/ipbkO8tHTe

On Monday's Int,l Day of Persons with Disabilities raise your voice for the rights, well-being & inclusion of people with disabilities everywhere. https://t.co/PbnNGW3BRg #GlobalGoals https://t.co/NsZcsiB9lR

#TakeYourSeat & watch live on Monday at 11.35 CET, as Sir David Attenborough delivers the People’s Seat Address at the UN Climate Conference #COP24 in Poland: https://t.co/3ZRSH3hVxm #ClimateAction https://t.co/eeaPWot5kF
The Universal Declaration of Human Rights guarantees the right of everyone to form opinions and to express & share them freely: https://t.co/rREx8a34wv #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/SFQy87kESh

24.9 million people worldwide are victims of forced labour.

On Sunday's Abolition of Slavery Day, support @ILO's global movement to end slavery once and for all.  https://t.co/PyzQ7T3Pi5 #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/ajj2SSNpX7

During the #16days of activism, let’s push for legislation that recognizes the importance of criminalizing perpetrators of gender-based violence. https://t.co/ryXpXL5Qu3  #HearMeToo https://t.co/xM8sgAul5P

Modern forms of slavery persist around the world.

Understanding the scale of the problem is the first step to knowing how to address it. Learn more on Sunday's Abolition of Slavery Day: https://t.co/5DylJmtARK #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/p6SsnVi9aZ

"I met a man named Harry on the internet. Turns out he was one of the most incredible humans ever"-- @Refugees' @Lorey shares his impressions of the late refugee advocate @Harryslaststand.  https://t.co/jyUzw7GY4S
What's happening this week at the UN? #ClimateAction at #COP24, Int'l Volunteer Day #IVD2018, World Soil Day & more. List of meetings here: https://t.co/GjD7KU578C https://t.co/W7RUsB7kyI
Learning services and emotional support are just a few of the ways @UNICEF helps young refugee children. Learn more: https://t.co/KOrDVpA5Ug via @UNICEFUganda https://t.co/0vT7DBvPra
Sneak peak: We are on site & ready for the UN Climate Conference in Katowice, Poland. 5 things you need to know about #COP24 👉 https://t.co/totxzehq3C #ClimateAction https://t.co/fqdJmWzJd3

40 million people are trapped in modern slavery. 

On Sunday's Abolition of Slavery Day & every day, help them reclaim their freedom & dignity: https://t.co/WGSzdvfw0p via @ilo https://t.co/nIecUfTGsM
The #PreventGenocide Convention was adopted 70 years ago. 45 countries have yet to join. See if your country is one of them: https://t.co/7AHmLrCYhj https://t.co/i7z2rIrG88

We see the problem. 
We know the science. 
We have the solutions. 

UN Climate Conference #COP24 kicks off Monday in Katowice, Poland to finalize #ParisAgreement implementation guidelines on #ClimateAction. https://t.co/totxzehq3C https://t.co/GMSOZTv9x4

HIV-positive mothers who are aware of their status & have access to treatment can stop the transmission of the virus to their babies.

Knowledge is power, says @UNAIDS Goodwill Ambassador @VictoriaBeckham on Saturday's #WorldAIDSDay. https://t.co/ZPxvSUju7v https://t.co/gf4myEl9dP

➡️ No home.
➡️ No asylum.
➡️ No hope.

The 60M people displaced within their own borders must be given a say in shaping their own lives: https://t.co/WrbDIfjyuX https://t.co/lHIA4OAWSJ
Knowledge is power. On Saturday's #WorldAIDSDay, make sure you #KnowYourStatus. Take the @UNAIDS quiz to learn more about HIV testing: https://t.co/meO92JLJSZ https://t.co/v4IWxoOyVs

"I look at my photos and it all comes back: the names, the faces, the stories. I catch myself wondering how these people are doing, if they are still alive. And then, I push that thought away." @WFP's @Marco_Frattini shares his reflections on Yemen. https://t.co/wWQRiA2MzD
Saturday: Côte d’Ivoire takes on rotating presidency of the Security Council for the month of December. Follow @CotedivoireOnu for updates: https://t.co/svznemQth6 https://t.co/iqfqyuz0mc
The world is off track when it comes to ending AIDS among children and adolescents by 2030, @UNICEF warns ahead of Saturday's #WorldAIDSDay: https://t.co/DUu1UznqY5  #GlobalGoals
At Friday's #Youth Development Summit in South Africa, @AminaJMohammed urged young Africans to become change agents & embrace the #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/aPiJyAeBax

$33M funding shortfall for lifesaving winter supplies & cash assistance could leave 1M children in Middle East & N. Africa out in the cold: https://t.co/xLNNkADYhg via @UNICEFmena https://t.co/VrcqW1GgXv

Apply now: @UN_HRC is seeking qualified candidates, preferably of indigenous origin, to provide advice & expertise on the rights of indigenous peoples: https://t.co/AF1pujpdKJ #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/6IYCxxbW7c
